properties.description: Aggregate Meter Read Events by Hour

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		max_timestamp as timestamp,
		avg_consumption as integer,
		total_consumption_low as decimal(9,3),
		total_consumption_high as decimal(9,3),
		total_consumption_gas as decimal(8,3),
		total_low as decimal(8,3),
		total_high as decimal(8,3),
		total_gas as decimal(7,3),
		total_back_low as decimal(9,3),
		total_back_high as decimal(9,3),
		back_low as decimal(8,3),
		back_high as decimal(8,3),
		interval_hours as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT  max(timestamp) as max_timestamp, \n        avg(current_consumption) as avg_consumption, \n        max(total_low) - lag(max(total_low), 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY max(timestamp)) as total_consumption_low,         \n        max(total_high) - lag(max(total_high), 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY max(timestamp)) as total_consumption_high, \n        max(gas) - lag(max(gas), 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY max(timestamp)) as total_consumption_gas,\n        max(total_low) as total_low,\n        max(total_high) as total_high,\n        max(gas) as total_gas,\n        max(back_low) - lag(max(back_low), 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY max(timestamp)) as total_back_low,\n        max(back_high) - lag(max(back_high), 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY max(timestamp)) as total_back_high,\n        max(back_low) as back_low,\n        max(back_high) as back_high,\n        DATEDIFF(hour, lag(max(timestamp)) OVER (ORDER BY max(timestamp)), max(timestamp)) as interval_hours\nFROM [dbo].[MeterReadEvents]\nWHERE CONVERT(date, timestamp) < CONVERT(date, getdate())\nGROUP BY DATEPART(HOUR, timestamp), CONVERT(date, timestamp)',
	format: 'query') ~> MeterReadingEvents
MeterReadingEvents sink(input(
		max_timestamp as timestamp,
		avg_consumption as long,
		total_consumption_low as decimal(8,3),
		total_consumption_high as decimal(8,3),
		total_consumption_gas as decimal(7,3),
		total_low as decimal(8,3),
		total_high as decimal(8,3),
		total_gas as decimal(7,3),
		total_back_low as decimal(8,3),
		total_back_high as decimal(8,3),
		back_low as decimal(8,3),
		back_high as decimal(8,3),
		interval_hours as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	postSQLs:['DELETE FROM [dbo].[MeterReadEvents] WHERE timestamp < CONVERT(date, getdate())'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MeterReadingDB
